page.title: 15Biography
page.content: Mrs.Harrison is a retired teacher who lives in a bungalow on the outskirts of the village.She was born in Walgrave and came as a pupil to Walgrave School. She trained as a teacher and taught in a poor part of Sheffield in 1929.She had a class of 43 children.We have 26 in our class .She taught in Walgrave School for 13 years.She remembers that all the desks were partly iron and they had an ink well,and you dipped your nibbed pen into the ink,now we use fountain pens and felt tips.The floors were wooden and you got splinters.The toilets were outside too.There were not any books to read nor any nice books to write in.The children sat in rows not in groups as we do now.
